plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Danger ! Risque extrêmement élevé de gel: Hazard ! Extremely high risk of frostbite in less than 2 minutes (see note) and hypothermia. Stay safe
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Danger extrême. Arrêt de travail dans de: Extreme danger. Work stoppage in many areas.
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Faible risque de gelures et d’hypothermi: Low risk of frostbite and hypothermia
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Le champ HUMIDITÉ RELATIVE ne peut être: The RELATIVE HUMIDITY field cannot be empty for the equipment:
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Le champ TEMPERATURE ne peut être vide p: The TEMPERATURE field cannot be empty for the equipment:
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Le champ VITESSE DU VENT ne peut être vi: The WIND SPEED field cannot be empty for equipment:
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Pas de risque de gelures ni d’hypothermi: No risk of frostbite or hypothermia (for normal exposure
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Risque modéré de gelures en 10 à 30 minu: Moderate risk of frostbite in 10 to 30 minutes from exposed skin and hypothermia
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Risque très élevé de gelures en 2 à 5 mi: Very high risk of frostbite in 2 to 5 minutes (see note) without full protection or activity
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Risque élevé de gelures en 5 à 10 minute: High risk of frostbite within 5 to 10 minutes (see note) from exposed skin and hypothermia
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Sensation d\\'inconfort assez grande. Pr: Quite a feeling of discomfort. Caution. Slow down some outdoor activities.
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Sensation d\\'inconfort généralisée. Dan: Generalized feeling of discomfort. Hazard. Avoid effort.
plugins\/temperature\/core\/class\/tempe.Sensation d\\'inconfort plus ou moins gr: Feeling of greater or lesser discomfort

plugins\/temperature\/desktop\/js\/tempe.Attention, cela va supprimer les command: Be careful, this will delete existing commands.
plugins\/temperature\/desktop\/js\/tempe.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir récréer toutes: Are you sure you want to recreate all the commands? This will delete existing orders

plugins\/temperature\/desktop\/php\/temp.(°C) Seuil de déclenchement de l'alerte: (°C) Threshold for triggering the temperature index discomfort alert, 40°C by default (danger threshold)
plugins\/temperature\/desktop\/php\/temp.(°C) Seuil de déclenchement de la pré-al: (°C) Threshold for triggering the temperature index discomfort pre-alert, 30°C by default
plugins\/temperature\/desktop\/php\/temp.Aucun équipement de type Température res: No Feeling Temperature type equipment has been created. Click on "Add" to start
plugins\/temperature\/desktop\/php\/temp.À ajuster en fonction des observations l: To be adjusted according to local observations and the position of the probe, 0 by default.
